title: 一个1.8村民机的思路
author: 36李
txt_content: 做一个中间有工作台的农田，上方做无限繁殖的门，往田里抓几个农民，丢几个种子给他们

虽然你是版主，但我还是得说说，楼主说的是村民繁殖，不是小麦自动农场，你发这个链接什么用？。。。 ...
村民的繁殖需求是"有门的房间"，楼主既然提到了田和种子，有很大的种田倾向，我给他推荐那个帖子有什么不妥么？
不过小伙子不错，有质疑精神，我看好你。

replies.author: Maaaake
replies.txt_content:
jianghr 发表于 2014-12-29 08:54
村民的繁殖需求是"有门的房间"，楼主既然提到了田和种子，有很大的种田倾向，我给他推荐那个帖子有什么不 ...
1.8的村民如果有食物会更快有欲望。如果在无限繁殖区域里建立一定的农田就会繁殖更快。庄主那个纯粹的是为了弄小麦

replies.author: jianghr
replies.txt_content:
Maaaake 发表于 2014-12-29 08:57
1.8的村民如果有食物会更快有欲望。如果在无限繁殖区域里建立一定的农田就会繁殖更快。庄主那个纯粹的是 ...
这点1.8更新部分倒没怎么关注，去翻阅了下英文wiki，确实如此：
(以下内容引自minecraft 英文 wiki)
Willingness
Additionally, villagers must be "willing" in order to breed. After mating, they will no longer be willing.

Villagers may become willing when the player trades with them. Willingness is granted the first time a new offer is traded, or at a one-in-five chance on subsequent trades. This will not cause them to immediately seek out a mate, however.

Villagers can also become willing by having either 3 bread, 12 carrots or 12 potatoes in one stack in their inventory. Any villager with an excess of food (usually farmers) will throw food at other villagers, allowing them to pick it up and obtain enough food to become willing. You can also throw bread, carrots, or potatoes at the villagers yourself to encourage breeding. Villagers will consume the required food upon becoming willing.
